titleStmt.title: Publick charity a sermon preached before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor, aldermen and governours of the several hospitals of the city at St. Bridget's-Church, on Wednesday in Easter-week, 1697 / by Tho. Jekyll ...
titleStmt.author: Jekyll, Thomas, 1646-1698.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
